alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Ashe; Surry; Watauga; Wilkes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 11:31PM EDT until March 12 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of around a tenth of an inch, with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Portions of northwest North Carolina and southwest Virginia. * WHEN...From 1 AM EST to 6 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The higher ice and snow amounts will be in the higher elevations.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow...sleet...or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities...and use caution while driving. The public is encouraged to report snowfall amounts...ice accumulation or wind damage to the National Weather Service via email at rnk.skywarn@noaa.gov...through Facebook or Twitter...or by calling 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Pictures are greatly appreciated. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
